Detailed Description

A view class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

view3D::view3D (    ) 
 

Primative Constructor Constructs an empty view object.

The object is then setup using the various mutator functions.

point3D    vpn,
point3D    vup
) 
 

Setup the camera in the scene.

Parameters:
vrp  The location of the viewing plane
vpn  The direction the camera is pointing
vup  The direction straight above the camera

double    dv
) 
 

Setup the size of the viewing plane.

Parameters:
du  The horizontal width of the viewing plane

double    B
) 
 

Set the front and back clip planes.

Parameters:
F  The location of the front clip plane relative to the vrp
B  The location of the back clip plane relative to the vrp

void view3D::setProjectionDistance (  double    d ) 
 

Set the focal length.

Parameters:
d  The location from the projection plane to the center of projection (the focal length)
